item.title: Problem with playerIsMember = 1
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

I have it set that you need to be playerIsMember >=1 to use the member’s portal

But when i set someone’s playerIsMember = 1, it doesn’t let them go in the portal it gives the “You need to be a member message”, heres what i have for the portal code

case 7288:
	if (playerIsMember >= 1) {
                sendMessage("You teleport to the members area!");
                teleportToX = 2540;
                teleportToY = 3890;      
            } else {
                sendMessage("You need to be a member to use this portal!");
                sendMessage("To get it you must get 3 skillcapes and 30m then");
       		sendMessage("Show the admin your capes and give them the 30m");
	     }
		break;

And then the playerIsMember sets back to 0 for some reason…

Read full topic
